title_advert: ['Single row modern THA in exclusive community']
location1: ['Club Villas at Dubai HillsDubai, Dubai Hills Estate']
amenities: ['Unfurnished\nBalcony']
descriptions:
['DescriptionPH Real Estate are delighted to be able to offer a THA Modern townhouse in a very good location within the Club Villas Community in Dubai Hills.
With handover in late 2020, this villa falls in line perfectly with Expo 2020.
The accomodation comprises an entrance hall, with powder room and laundry then the living space opens ups to a really nice open plan space giving two living areas, dining room and kitchen.
On the first floor, the master bedroom has its own walk in dressing room, en-suite bathroom and terrace.  Two further bedrooms share a separate shower room.
Outside, there is a terrace and open space in the rear garden, enjoying a good level of privacy as the property has no neighbours behind.   There is a further roof terrace for all properties.
To the front of the property is an are of covered parking for two vehicles
Club Villas is one of the most prestigious townhouse communities within Dubai Hills
Please call Martin Hyre +971567898722 or email martin@phrealestate.ae']

title_advert: ['Single row 1M directly onto pool and park']
amenities: ['Unfurnished\nBalcony']
descriptions:
['DescriptionPH Real Estate are very pleased to be able to offer this very well presented 1m villa in the best possible location in Mira 5, the most desirable of all of the Miras.
With 2347 sq ft of built up area, the 1M offers good accommodation for a family and as the property comes vacant on transfer, this property is perfect for a family looking to move soon.
The accommodation comprises an entrance hall, powder room, living room, kitchen, laundry and maid’s room on the ground floor.
On the first floor, the master bedroom has an en-suite bathroom and a walk in wardrobe.  Two further bedrooms share a jack and jill bathroom.
Outside, there is an attractive landscaped rear garden immediately backing onto the pool and park.
To the front of the property, there is off road parking for two vehicles.
Mira 5 is the most desirable of all of the Miras, with the largest park, it is also the most central of all five of the Miras.
Please call Martin Hyre +971567898722 or email martin@phrealestate.ae']

title_advert: ['Great sea view apartment fully furnished']
location1: ['Nikki Beach Resort and Spa DubaiDubai, Jumeirah, Pearl Jumeirah']
amenities:
['Furnished
Balcony
Built in Wardrobes
Covered Parking
Kitchen Appliances
Maids Room
Security
Shared Gym
View of Water']
descriptions:
["DescriptionNikki Beach Hotels & Resorts has been operating in Dubai since two years and has enchanted residents and visitors alike with its unique beach vibe and luxurious charm. A desirable destination in various worldwide locations, the brand has brought to Dubai an impressive and sought-after contemporary venue. The inspired venue's prestigious Nikki Beach Residences have been created for residents who wish to not simply experience, but live and breathe the brand's lifestyle, day to day. 
Nikki Beach Residences in Dubai is an upscale and state-of-the-art community of 63 branded apartments, designed in collaboration with Meraas. Along with 1 to 4 bedroom units, Nikki Beach Residences offers only a total of 6 townhouses, which have direct walking access to the beach, and a lovely view of the city skyline. 
The current property on offer is one of  the best apartments in the whole development - a tastefully 3 bedroom furnished apartment with a large built-up area, and a well-designed layout that is spacious with bright interiors. A large solid wooden door opens up to the living and dining area, which leads into the outdoor terrace that overlooks the garden, swimming pool and the sea. The kitchen is open plan and fully equipped. It has been beautifully finished in white that looks its part in the Nikki Beach scheme of interiors. The maid's room is set towards the back with a side entrance leading to the lobby. 
All the bedrooms are very spacious. The residents will find the floor to ceiling windows apt for beachfront living. They have access to a large balcony, bringing the outdoors in. The master bedroom has twin sinks, a large bath-tub and a shower area. There are adequate amount of wardrobes, as would be expected in a luxury development such as this."]

descriptions:
['DescriptionInteractive living with amenities, accessibility & lifestyle only Emaar can deliver. 1 and 2-bedroom apartments with golf and park views. GOLFVILLE, premium collaborative living. Live your best life in the green heart of Dubai. With vast open spaces on each side of your building and never-ending views of the golf course and park.
GOLFVILLE is not just about the premium amenities and vibrant atmosphere. It s about having the best of urban lifestyles at your fingertips. 
Take a leisurely stroll and find yourself at the iconic DUBAI HILLS GOLF CLUB. Designed by European Golf Design and operated by Troon Golf, this 18-hole Championship golf course is the ideal place for you to keep fit and re-charge.
At GOLFVILLE, you are always stimulated, always at one with nature For all your shopping and dining needs, the DUBAI HILLS MALL is only a short drive away. Perfect for a bit of retail therapy or just catching up with friends

descriptions:
['DescriptionKnight Frank are delighted to offer for sale this large residential villa plot located in Dubai Hills Estate, 
This plot has one of the best locations  and is one of the largest  in the project and is priced to sell. 
It is fully paid  and title deed is issued.
Dubai Hills Estate  has elegantly designed  neighbourhoods set around an 18-hole championship golf course.Residents will have a wide range of access to sporting and leisure amenities such as swimming pool, BBQ area, cafe and restaurants,  public park, gymnasium and a close proximity to supermarket and shopping malls.
Lifestyle amenities such as the Hills Estate Mall,  Central Park,  exceptional healthcare facilities,  and high-end retail outlets are all easily accessible.
The Fairways  is located in the Dubai Hills District part of  Mohammed Bin Rashid Bin City. Situated centrally by the junction of Umm Al Suqeim Road and  Al Khail Road,  Sheikh Zayed Road is easily accessible and only a 10-minute drive from  Downtown Dubai
